title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the expression `new Date('3/2/2005')` as a value in a table filter, an error is thrown.
OB: Save and preview the report. When filtering the table based on a datetime column using `new Date('3/2/2005')` as the filter value, no errors should occur.
EB: After saving and previewing the report, the table filter should work without errors when using `new Date('3/2/2005')` as the filter value.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow the steps below:
1. Create a new data source and dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table into the report.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
4. In the filter expression, enter `new Date('3/2/2005')` as the value.
